DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study was to compare short- and longterm outcomes after laparoscopic and open Nissen fundoplication in children.
DOC.brief_title: Is Laparoscopic Fundoplication Better Than Open Fundoplication in Children ?
DOC.criteria: Age 015 years All patients accepted for primary fundoplication at Oslo University Hospital Age over 16 years Parents not speaking Norwegian or English well Prior fundoplication Patients with comorbidities considered as unsuited for laparoscopic surgery (diaphragma hernia, several previous abdominal operations etc)
